response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. This exceptional piece is not just an item; it's an investment that could potentially increase your profitability by millions. Given its immense worth to us, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity is designed to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, or if you have any questions about the product's capabilities and benefits. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
